summary: AN ORDINANCE requiring the filing of quarterly declarations of intent and financial statements in connection with the conduct by bona fide charitable or nonprofit organizations of those bingo, raffle and amusement games exempted from the criminal penalties of state law by Chapter 280, Laws of 1971, 1st Extraordinary Session, and superseding Sections 22, 23, 24, 25 and 26 of Ordinance 16046 to the extent in conflict.
